forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
